description: An obvious mixture of two sequences: the natural numbers interleaved with the even numbers.
comments: a(n) = number of ordered, length two, compositions of n with at least one odd summand - _Len Smiley_, Nov 25 2001Also number of 0's in n-th row of triangle in A071037. - _Hans Havermann_, May 26 2002a(n) = (n - n mod 2)/(2 - n mod 2). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 30 2002For n > 2: a(n) = number of odd terms in row n-2 of triangle A265705. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 15 2015
